video.title: Man Caves
video.synopsis: Contractor Jason Cameron and former NFL star Tony "The Goose" Siragusa help guys turn their quirky man-cave dreams into handy, custom-built reality.

episodes.synopsis: Tom's a big Miami Dolphins fan living in New Jersey, so the Man Cave team turns his basement into the perfect place to follow his team from afar.
episodes.title: NFL Sunday Ticket Cave

episodes.synopsis: In exchange for turning Tony into his next roast victim, comedian Jeff Ross gets a big apartment makeover from the Man Cave crew.
episodes.title: Roast Master General Man Cave

episodes.synopsis: Pro lacrosse player Paul Rabil wants the Man Cave team to convert the lower level of his house into a sweet space with a custom bar and a new office.
episodes.title: Lacrosse Man Cave

episodes.synopsis: Kevin Jonas and his wife want the Man Cave team to work quickly to turn their basement into a space reminiscent of a small-town main street.
episodes.title: Kevin Jonas' USA Man Cave

episodes.synopsis: The team renovates an old RV from the inside out to create the ultimate mobile tailgating destination, with interactive games and multiple TVs.
episodes.title: DirecTV's Tailgating Man Cave

episodes.synopsis: An electric lineman and his wife buy a new house, and the Man Cave team transforms the basement into a high-voltage space that powers itself.
episodes.title: High-Voltage Man Cave

episodes.synopsis: A top police dog trainer gets his own man cave that serves as a tribute to K-9 officers and their partners from around the world.
episodes.title: K-9 Man Cave

episodes.synopsis: Anthony made a deal with his girlfriend that gave him control of their basement, so he gets the Man Cave crew to make the ultimate pirate hangout.
episodes.title: Pirate Man Cave

episodes.synopsis: Single father Billy doesn't have many moments to himself, so he wants his man cave to remind him of the days he used to spend on the Jersey Shore.
episodes.title: Night on the Pier Man Cave
